p: This study focused on the perspectives of health and climate stakeholders from the countries of Barbados and Dominica ( Fig 1), SIDS in the eastern Caribbean, as well as regional Caribbean stakeholders. There is a high burden of arboviral diseases in both countries [ 46â€“ 50] ( Table 1). Barbados and Dominica were selected because of the regional and national interest in building on previous projects, wherein the health sector identified climate services as a top priority for the management of arboviruses [ 51, 52].
